question: With which network Flipkart Tie up for 4G Smartphones?
explanation: Vodafone India partnered with e-commerce marketplace Flipkart to provide a range of entry-level smartphones at an effective price of Rs999. As part of the tie-up, Vodafone has rolled out cash-back offers on a select range of entry-level 4G smartphone models available under Flipkart's #MyFirst4GSmartphone campaign. For the offer, customers have a recharge least Rs150 per month for 36 months.
